author: morciuch
msg: Daemons can now be manually started (see Bugzilla bug# 21195).
Also, removed the redundant security check which prevented admin from accessing this Daemon Admin Portlet.

msg: Enhanced the exception handling for cases when rss contains no title and/or description.

author: morciuch
msg: The portlet customizer now properly uses parameter values from psml (see Bugzilla bug# 20075)

msg: Added lacking cases in checkPermission, fix by Andrei Mikhin (see Bugzilla bug# 16956)
